name: Mathew V Kariath

top_projects.name: DailyBraniac-Bot
top_projects.description: This project aims to create a Telegram bot that sends random Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) to users on a daily basis. Users can interact with the bot to receive questions, possibly with the option to see explanations for answers or track their progress.

csacet/website_csa.summary: Recent updates in this repository involved various modifications to the landing page, including responsiveness and feature enhancements. Additionally, fixes for font issues and conflicts were resolved, with changes committed in multiple push events. Pull requests were also merged to add valuable content for CET and CSE.

mvkariath/mvkariath.summary: A recent update in this repository involved updating the README.md file, providing users with more accurate and relevant information about the repository's content and purpose.

profile_summary:
Mathew V Kariath is a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with a strong technical foundation in C, Python, and JavaScript. With a solid grasp of front-end and back-end development, he excels at crafting seamless and efficient software solutions. Boasting a network of 34 professional connections and a portfolio of 37 public repositories, Mathew is a reliable and innovative force in the development community.

As a seasoned developer, Mathew brings a unique combination of technical expertise and collaborative spirit to his projects. His proficiency in multiple programming languages and dedication to staying up-to-date with industry trends make him an asset to any development team. With a focus on delivering top-quality solutions and a passion for driving innovation, Mathew is a valuable partner for businesses and individuals seeking to bring their software visions to life.
